law.catch_line: Recordkeeping office -- Agent for service of process.
law.text:
Each limited partnership shall continuously maintain in this Commonwealth:
A registered office and registered agent that comply with KRS 14A.4-010; and
An office which may, but need not be, a place of business in this state, at which shall be kept the records required by KRS 362.409 to be maintained.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 151, sec. 89, effective January 1, 2011. -- Repeal the prior repeal contained in 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 239, which was to have been effective January 1, 2008, 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 137, sec. 180, effective June 26, 2007. -- Repealed 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 239, effective January 1, 2008. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 341, sec. 49, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 284, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1988.
